message.game.description: &fControl the area or push all your opponents into the void and to win the game. Use your pearls to catch up and survive.
gui.host.pc-main.name: &8PearlControl (Settings)
host.category.main.name: &bPearlControl
host.option.spawn-ender-pearls.name: &bEnderPearls &8(Spawn)
host.option.spawn-ender-pearls.descripti:
&7Set the amount of EnderPearl
&7to give to players at spawn.
host.option.kill-ender-pearls.name: &bEnderPearls &8(Kill)
host.option.kill-ender-pearls.descriptio:
&7Set the amount of EnderPearl
&7to give when a player is
&7killed.
host.option.allowing-capture.name: &bCapture
host.option.allowing-capture.description:
&7Set whether the capture is
&7allowed or not.
host.option.capture-time.name: &bCapture time
host.option.capture-time.description:
&7Set the necessary time to
&7capture the area.
host.option.knockback-multiplier.name: &bRepulsion multiplier
host.option.lives.name: &bLives
host.option.respawn-time.name: &bRespawn time

&7Set the time of respawn
